类的使用
org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.ContentNegotiationConfigurer

  • 使用ContentNegotiationConfigurer的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation
    Annotation-based setup for Spring MVC.

    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation中ContentNegotiationConfigurer的使用

      返回ContentNegotiationConfigurer的org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.defaultContentType(org.springframework.http.MediaType defaultContentType)
      Set the default content type.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.favorParameter(boolean favorParameter)
      Indicate whether a request parameter should be used to determine the requested media type with the 2nd highest priority, i.e.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.favorPathExtension(boolean favorPathExtension)
      Indicate whether the extension of the request path should be used to determine the requested media type with the highest priority.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.ignoreAcceptHeader(boolean ignoreAcceptHeader)
      Indicate whether the HTTP Accept header should be ignored altogether.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.mediaType(java.lang.String extension, org.springframework.http.MediaType mediaType)
      Add mappings from file extensions to media types.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.mediaTypes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.springframework.http.MediaType> mediaTypes)
      Add mappings from file extensions to media types.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.parameterName(java.lang.String parameterName)
      Set the parameter name that can be used to determine the requested media type if the favorParameter(boolean) property is true.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.replaceMediaTypes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.springframework.http.MediaType> mediaTypes)
      Add mappings from file extensions to media types replacing any previous mappings.
      ContentNegotiationConfigurer ContentNegotiationConfigurer.useJaf(boolean useJaf)
      Indicate whether to use the Java Activation Framework as a fallback option to map from file extensions to media types.
      参数类型为ContentNegotiationConfigurer的org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void WebMvcConfigurerAdapter.configureContentNegotiation(ContentNegotiationConfigurer configurer)
      Configure content negotiation options.
      void WebMvcConfigurer.configureContentNegotiation(ContentNegotiationConfigurer configurer)
      Configure content negotiation options.
